articles.title: SJinn Launches Revolutionary Video Agent, an AI Creative Director for Automated Ad and Story Video Production  Aug. 5, 2025 23:30
articles.summary: SJinn AI launched its Video Agent, an AI Creative Director, designed to automate advertisement and story video creation. The platform automates the entire production pipeline, from script to final film, and addresses character and style consistency. SJinn aims to make high-quality video production accessible and cost-effective.

articles.title: SJinn Launches Revolutionary Video Agent, an AI Creative Director for Automated Ad and Story Video Production
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SJinn AI launched its flagship product, a revolutionary Video Agent, on August 5, 2025. This AI Creative Director automates the end-to-end production pipeline for advertisements and story videos, from script to final film.

articles.title: 榮耀MagicOS首發支援鴻蒙NEXT換機複製
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 亞馬遜廣告中國首次參加在上海舉行的遊戲行業盛會之一
articles.summary: 榮耀 recently announced that 榮耀MagicOS 9.0 supports data migration with Huawei's Harmony NEXT. 上汽MG4 pre-sale event was held in Hangzhou introducing a new product of the company.

articles.title: Tech Talk: See yourself in any outfit online with Google's AI Try On
articles.author: Tosin Fakile
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI-powered 'Try On' feature which allows shoppers to visualize how clothes will look on them virtually before purchase. Shoppers can upload a full body photo and see themselves in different outfits. Google is also launching a 'Vision Match' feature in the fall which will visualize entire looks in AI mode.

articles.title: Stanley new Mini Lunch Box upgrades your mid-day munch for back-to-school 2025
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Stanley launched the All Day Mini Lunch Box on June 25, available in 4.2 qt ($45) and 6.3qt ($60) sizes. The lunch box features crush-resistant insulation, zippered closure, adjustable strap, and BPA-free materials, designed for school and daily use.

articles.title: Meghan Markle breaks silence as she issues major Instagram update
articles.author: Hanisha Sethi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, launched its 2024 Napa Valley rosé wine on August 5. The new vintage is available for purchase online, with three bottles costing $90, six bottles $159, and 12 bottles $300. The wine is described as having notes of stone fruit and minerality, reminiscent of Provençal styles.

articles.title: Walmart launches new moving stores to challenge Target
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Walmart launched "Walmart Delivers," a fleet of themed mobile stores, to engage Gen Z. These pop-up retail experiences feature giveaways and photo ops at events across the U.S. from August through November 2025.

articles.title: NewsOut Integrates Mobiquity Technologies' CMOne Platform to Advance AI-Driven Brand Amplification  Aug. 5, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: NewsOut will integrate Mobiquity's newly launched CMOne platform to automate brand storytelling and scale content creation. This integration enhances NewsOut's ability to optimize paid media for clients and provides access to AI-powered marketing tools, including video, caption, and social media asset generation and distribution across various platforms. The integration allows emerging brands to have access to enterprise-grade marketing capabilities.

articles.title: Kyndryl and Nova Intelligence Announce Strategic Collaboration to Accelerate SAP Transformation for Customers
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Kyndryl and Nova Intelligence are collaborating to accelerate SAP transformation for customers. Kyndryl will integrate Nova Intelligence's AI agents to speed up customer migration to SAP Cloud ERP and reduce costs. This partnership supports customers in modernizing SAP systems and achieving Clean Core compliance.

articles.title: Kyndryl and Nova Intelligence Announce Strategic Collaboration to Accelerate SAP Transformation for Customers
articles.author: Kyndryl
articles.summary: Kyndryl aligns its SAP Services with Nova Intelligence AI agents. The alignment speeds customer migration to SAP Cloud ERP. It also delivers cost savings to the customers.

articles.title: Tevogen.AI Expands Collaboration With Databricks and Microsoft to Build the Beta Version of Its
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: Tevogen.AI is exploring external market opportunities to generate revenue. A beta version of their offering is being incorporated, implying a potential product or service development.

articles.title: Delivering 1.5M TPS Inference on NVIDIA GB200 NVL72, NVIDIA Accelerates OpenAI gpt-oss Models From Cloud to Edge (Nvidia Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: NVIDIA and OpenAI have launched the OpenAI gpt-oss-20b and gpt-oss-120b, continuing their collaborative AI innovation that began with NVIDIA DGX in 2016. NVIDIA has optimized both new open-weight models.

articles.title: USU's OPDD Program Bridges Gap Between Academia and Industry: Student Shines at Lifetime Products
articles.author: Owen Matthews
articles.summary: Josie Layton, an OPDD student, is applying her academic learnings at Lifetime Products as a design researcher. She is part of a team tasked with bringing fresh insights and innovative approaches to the products Lifetime Products releases, highlighting her involvement in product development.

articles.title: This app can unlock some Hyundai models
articles.author: Alexander Clark
articles.summary: Hyundai introduced an innovative app that can unlock certain car models. This app reshapes vehicle interaction and integrates with digital lives, providing drivers with unprecedented convenience and security.

articles.title: Microsoft launches 5G Surface Laptop for professionals
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced the Surface Laptop with 5G connectivity. This new device is designed for modern professionals, providing portability, speed, and always-on internet access. It aims to enhance productivity for mobile workforces.

articles.title: No WhatsApp? No Problem – Guest Chats Are Coming
articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.summary: WhatsApp is testing a new "guest chats" feature in its Android beta version. This feature allows WhatsApp users to invite non-users to a chat via a link, eliminating the need for the recipient to have a WhatsApp account or app.

articles.title: Wyze announces $20 smartwatch with nine-day battery life
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Wyze announced a new smartwatch priced at $20. The smartwatch features a nine-day battery life.

articles.title: I Tried Powdered Body Wash — & It's Not What I Expected
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: LOoPHA has launched a new Hand + Body Powder Wash, available in Broadleaf Forest, Oud + Amber, and Chalk scents. The powder transforms into a gel when mixed with water, offering a unique cleansing experience. The product is sulfate-free, travel-friendly, and priced at $22.

articles.title: Asus Fragrance Mouse MD101 Review: A Scent-sational desk companion
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: ASUS has launched the Fragrance Mouse MD101, priced at Rs 1,999, with a unique feature: a refillable chamber for aromatic oils, releasing scent through natural evaporation. The mouse offers dual-mode connectivity (2.4GHz dongle or Bluetooth) and precise control with adjustable DPI levels.

articles.title: AWS announces high resource Lambda functions, container image support & millisecond billing
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: AWS Lambda now offers up to 10MB of memory and 6 vCPUs for serverless functions. This enhancement enables developers to build more compute-intensive functions.

articles.title: OpenAI announces two 'gpt-oss' open AI models, and you can download them today
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing new generative AI models, including gpt-oss-120b.

articles.title: 5 best hair dryers of 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.author: Talia Ergas
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Supersonic Nural hairdryer, featuring smart personalization, heat protection, and magnetic attachments with built-in sensors for memorizing preferred settings. The Dyson Supersonic r also launched with five magnetic attachments, each with built-in RFID chips that remember last used settings, and is designed to be lightweight and ergonomic. SRI launched the DryQ hairdryer, which features built-in red light therapy designed to help promote scalp health, dry hair faster, and stimulate hair growth.

articles.title: AP Ignites Loyalty Drive With Nationwide Visco 2000 Instant Reward Promo
articles.author: Ayobamiji Komolafe
articles.summary: Ardova Plc launched the "AP Visco 2000 Instant Reward Promo," a nationwide campaign offering instant cash and airtime rewards to customers who purchase selected AP lubricant products like Visco 2000, Super Visco Static, and HD40. The promotion, running from August 1, 2024, to December 31, 2025, aims to reward customer loyalty and reinforce the brand's competitive positioning.

articles.title: Save $80 on the Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer to get the ultimate blowout
articles.author: Malarie Gokey
articles.summary: Dyson is offering its Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer for $300, reduced from $380. The hair dryer features technology to regulate heat and prevent damage, a high-speed motor, multiple speed and temperature settings, and a styling concentrator attachment. Dyson claims the Origin can improve smoothness, shine, and reduce frizz.

articles.title: PUBG Mobile Account Boosting Service
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: PUBG Mobile introduced a limited-time offer that provides players with 30,000 Intensity and 11,400 free gifts to enhance their in-game experience. Recent updates include a Clan system, impacting boosting strategies, and boosters are adapting by offering Clan-Based Boosting and utilizing UGC features.

articles.title: The DreamCloud Premier mattress has no business being so affordable given its hotel-like luxury
articles.author: Lauren Allain
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering the DreamCloud Premier Hybrid mattress, positioned as a more affordable alternative to luxury hybrid mattresses. The queen-size mattress is available for around $950 when on sale and promises comfort and support using high-quality materials. Testers of the mattress experienced a luxury hotel-like sleeping experience.

articles.title: From Utility to Smart Tech: Ausko's Role in Singapore's Evolving Waste Landscape
articles.author: Ausko
articles.summary: Ausko is focusing on customized and scalable solutions, including advising on product selection and offering tailored bin designs. They developed and launched the Big Buddy Bin, a monkey-proof bin, in collaboration with the National Environment Agency (NEA). This reflects Ausko's approach to responding to real-world conditions with practical bin design.

articles.title: Sausage roll in gravy? Greggs and KFC serve up "culinary crossover of the century" but ...
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Greggs and KFC have formed a partnership to introduce a new product or service to their fans.

articles.title: Dreamcash Begins Rollout of Trading Platform with Hyperliquid Integration via Waitlist Access
articles.author: Chainwire
articles.summary: Dreamcash has launched an invite-only waitlist for its new crypto wealth platform, scheduled to debut in September 2025. The platform offers AI-driven market analysis, automated yield strategies, and seamless onboarding, integrating with Hyperliquid's infrastructure. An early adopter rewards system is also in place during the pre-launch phase.

articles.title: MechMaxx: Young NYC Agri-Tech Brand Launches STL1000 Mini Skid Steer, Bringing a Fresh Face to a Traditionally Boring Industry
articles.author: Sacramento Bee
articles.summary: MechMaxx launched its STL1000 Mini Tracked Skid Steer, aiming to provide resilient and pragmatic machinery to landowners, farmers, and contractors. The company is also preparing a new flagship warehouse and storefront in New Jersey where customers can test-drive machines like the STL1000.

articles.title: I wish I could buy this Android tablet to replace my iPad for this one key reason
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Huawei is launching the MatePad 11.5, an Android tablet featuring a PaperMatte display with nano-level etching and anti-glare technology. The tablet includes productivity tools like Huawei Notes with AI Handwriting Enhancement and GoPaint, and it will be available from August 18th through Huawei's online store and select retailers for £349 (without keyboard) or £399 (with keyboard).

articles.title: Soothe Your Skin With These 14 Game-Changing After-Sun Products
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Nivea introduced its new silky shower cream, formulated with aloe extract.

articles.title: Best Logo Makers 2025 for Your Business [Expert Guide]
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Turbologo and other AI-driven logo makers are highlighted as solutions for businesses to quickly create professional brand identities. Turbologo provides AI-driven creation, brand kits, and multi-language support and focuses on a balance of automation and customization, providing not just logos but complete brand assets tailored to your business needs. These platforms utilize machine learning and vast design libraries to deliver tailored results, offering features like dynamic previews and vector exports.

articles.title: Opening date confirmed for Victoria Square's newest tenant
articles.summary: Astrid & Miyu is opening its first store in Northern Ireland at Victoria Square Shopping Centre on August 8th. The jewelry brand, known for its sentimental and innovative designs, will be located on the ground floor. Breshka and Mowgli are also planning to open their stores in Victoria Square.

articles.title: I Only Wash My Hair Every 10 Days, Thanks to This Dry Shampoo
articles.author: Jamie Sanders
articles.summary: Amika's Perk Up Dry Shampoo is a residue-free dry shampoo that leaves hair feeling freshly washed without white cast.  Amika Perk Up Dry Shampoo has a fresh aroma and extends blowouts. An anti-humidity spray protects hair for up to 24 hours and a detangling primer protects hair from heat and UV rays.

articles.title: Microsoft's new Windows Feature Experience Packs are smaller updates to Windows 10
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Microsoft launched new Windows Feature Experience Packs. These packs are smaller updates to Windows 10.

articles.title: MAKYAJ Herbal Beauty products opens first store in Valley
articles.author: Monitor News Bureau
articles.summary: MAKYAJ Herbal Beauty products opened its first store in Srinagar to satisfy customers and reach them on their doorsteps. CEO Shamim Ahmad said the company decided to open a store in Kashmir based on customer demand and feedback, to allow people to take benefit from their products. The company aims to take the products to every corner of JK.

articles.title: Face (Nearly) Any Homeowner Problem Like A Pro With These 46 Essential Solutions
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The content introduces various products and services for home cleaning, maintenance, and improvement. These include solutions for removing oil stains, applying concrete paint, reaching high branches with a trimming saw, and creating privacy with faux ivy or window film. Additionally, it suggests mold-removal gel, portable washing machines, drain clog dissolvers, and various cleaning tools and solutions, all aimed at simplifying household tasks and enhancing living spaces.

articles.title: A new Nintendo Direct is due this week and Silksong fans want a release date
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Team Cherry's game Silksong is anticipated to receive updates at the Nintendo Indie World showcase and will be available on Microsoft's ROG Xbox Ally handheld via Game Pass around the holiday season. Microsoft is promoting Silksong and will offer a demo at Gamescom this month. The game is slated for a 2025 launch.

articles.title: Run, don't walk — this Dyson vacuum is on sale for only $200
articles.author: Nina Derwin
articles.summary: Dyson's Big Ball Turbinehead Canister Vacuum is on sale at Walmart for $200, originally priced at $379. The vacuum features strong suction, self-righting capability, a hygienic bin emptying mechanism, advanced filtration, and comes with four tools for various floor types.

articles.title: Panda Express and Buldak 'Reinvent' Sweet & Sour with Explosive New Heat
articles.author: Matt Wadleigh
articles.summary: Panda Express has launched Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken, a new dish in partnership with Buldak, known for its spicy noodles. This is Buldak's first U.S. restaurant brand partnership. The dish is available until October 7, 2025, in select markets including Seattle, Chicago, Atlanta, New York, Denver, Washington D.C., San Diego, Houston, Phoenix and Orlando.

articles.title: Call for Nominations: 2025 ADWEEK Tech Stack Awards
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: ADWEEK Tech Stack Awards is a new program recognizing companies for groundbreaking product and platform launches in marketing, advertising, and media. The awards span over 20 product categories, including Social Media Marketing, Creator Marketing, Creative Tech, Strategic AI, and many more, celebrating innovation and revenue impact.  The awards spotlight companies behind innovations pushing the industry forward.

articles.title: StreetMetrics Launches Intelligence: The Command Center for Smarter OOH Decisions
articles.summary: StreetMetrics launched StreetMetrics Intelligence, a new platform for out-of-home (OOH) advertising. The platform unifies campaign performance, market trends, and inventory insights into one workspace and is powered by a data foundation analyzing over 1.6 million ad units. It offers features like SmartSearch and market-level benchmarking.

articles.title: Walmart launches new stores to target younger audiences
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Walmart has launched "Walmart Delivers," a fleet of themed mobile stores intended to engage Gen Z. These pop-up retail experiences will feature giveaways and photo opportunities at events across the U.S. from August through November 2025.

articles.title: Mention Network to spearhead the Internet Capital Markets
articles.summary: Mention Network launched its decentralized AI data layer and a browser extension. The extension captures real-time user interactions with AI models, rewarding contributors and safeguarding privacy. These offerings aim to help brands track and improve their visibility within generative AI search.

articles.title: Amid Changes In Cannabis Delivery Preferences, PAX Unveils A Solution
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: PAX unveiled the FLOW, a portable dry herb vaporizer. This combustion-free device aims for superior vapor performance, flavor, and ease of use.

articles.title: Pamela Anderson Finally Speaks Out After Fans Accuse Meghan Markle of Ripping Off Her Cooking Show
articles.author: Annalyn Zoglmann
articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched a new cooking show, 'With Love, Meghan' on Netflix in March 2025, which has been compared to Pamela Anderson's 'Pamela's Cooking with Love'. Markle also launched her brand 'As Ever'. Despite criticism and low viewership, a second season of 'With Love, Meghan' is planned.

articles.title: Howdy, Subscribers! Roku Enters The SVOD Space
articles.author: Adam Jacobson
articles.summary: Roku is launching a new subscription video-on-demand service. This launch was mentioned in a shareholder letter and earnings call.

articles.title: OnePlus के New Nord Series के Basic Differences: OnePlus Nord 5 और OnePlus Nord CE 5 में क्या है खास?
articles.author: Produced by: मोहिनी केडिया
articles.summary: OnePlus is highlighting the key differences between its new Nord series phones, specifically the OnePlus Nord 5 and the OnePlus Nord CE 5. The article focuses on what makes each phone unique.

articles.title: The New PAX FLOW Vape: Smooth Moves, a Luxury Look, and Plenty of Flower Power
articles.author: Veronica Booth
articles.summary: PAX has released the new PAX FLOW dry herb vaporizer, designed to deliver a smoother and more flavorful cannabis consumption experience. It features a side-mounted oven, four heating modes, fast charging, and enhanced airflow compared to previous PAX models. The PAX FLOW retails for $350 and aims to provide a high-end, discreet flower consumption method.

articles.title: Howdy, ad-free streaming service
articles.summary: Roku is launching Howdy, an ad-free streaming service. This new service expands Roku's offerings in the streaming entertainment market.

articles.title: Brandwatch and Trajaan Partner to Bring World-Class Search Intelligence to Consumer Insights Français
articles.author: Brandwatch
articles.summary: Brandwatch partnered with Trajaan to expand its data capabilities by integrating search intelligence into its platform. This new offering allows Brandwatch customers to combine social media insights with search data, providing a more comprehensive understanding of consumer intent and market trends. The Trajaan partnership will embed search intelligence into Brandwatch's platform and services.

articles.title: Finally: A Safe Sleek and Durable Basic Phone
articles.summary: Keyphone, a new phone designed for distraction-free experience, is launching with features like a QWERTY keyboard, touch screen, and modular swappable parts including camera and keypad. It is now live on Indiegogo for pre-orders with estimated delivery in October 2025.

articles.title: I have used this (on sale!) Amazon mop for over a year — if you're a clean freak, it's the best
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: The JOYMOOP Mop and Bucket is a 2-in-1 mop system featuring separate chambers for washing and drying and includes a scraper blade for removing grit. It has a 360-degree rotating mop head, adjustable stainless steel handle, and machine-washable microfiber mop pads; JOYMOOP Mop and Bucket is available on Amazon Canada.

articles.title: Shoppers in frenzy over ‘stunning' new Prada perfume dupe in Aldi that ‘smells lovely' – and it's only £1.99
articles.author: Digital Fabulous Editor
articles.summary: Aldi introduced Lacura Prism, a perfume dupe for Prada Paradoxe, along with Miss Dior and Baccarat Rouge dupes in a mini perfume range. Additionally, Aldi is reintroducing the LED Face Mask for \u00a312.99, the LED Mirror with Make-Up Brush Set for \u00a35.99, and the Dual Hair Styler for \u00a316.99.

articles.title: Here's where you can buy a Nintendo Switch
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch is available for purchase at various retailers. The article provides locations where consumers can acquire the product.

articles.title: 47 Budget-Friendly Items For Inflation-Weary Shoppers
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash, a body wash version of their facial serum. Revlon launched a hot air brush with open-ended vents. The Face Shop offers a facial foaming cleanser formulated with rice water. Monday Haircare released Dry Shampoo with a gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Neutrogena launched Ultra Sheer Moisturizing Face SPF 60 Serum. Better Life offers all-natural tile and tub cleaner. Cerave introduced eye repair cream with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide. Denman Hair Brush released a hair brush designed to detangle and shape curls. Dash launched a rapid egg cooker and retro stand mixer. SwitchBot introduced Smart Switch Button Pusher. E.l.f released Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara.

articles.title: 'It's never been easier to connect': Penneys launches new app for customers in Ireland
articles.author: Diarmuid Shortt
articles.summary: Penneys/Primark has launched a new mobile app for customers in Ireland, offering features such as browsing new trends, checking stock availability, store locator, and personalized notifications. The app aims to enhance the customer experience by providing a convenient way to explore Penneys' ranges anytime, anywhere, although direct purchases are not available through the app.

articles.title: Simply NUC Rebrands as SNUC Systems, Making a Bold Shift Toward Real-World AI at the Edge
articles.summary: Simply NUC rebranded to SNUC Systems, signaling a shift to AI-powered computing platforms for edge deployment. SNUC Systems focuses on delivering rugged, modular compute platforms optimized for AI workloads in sectors like defense, manufacturing, and healthcare. SNUC aims to provide trusted solutions for real-world AI deployment.

articles.title: Breaking the Dirty Cycle: YEEDI's Self-Cleaning Mop Ushers in a New Cleaning Paradigm
articles.summary: YEEDI introduced the OZMO Roller Mop, a new mopping technology featured in the YEEDI M14 PLUS robot vacuum and mop. The OZMO Roller Mop aims to improve cleaning performance by addressing the issues of traditional robot mops that recirculate dirty water.

articles.title: Ditch the razor and get 21% off the Braun smart IPL with 4K already sold
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Braun is introducing the Silk-Expert Pro 5, an at-home IPL hair removal device that uses SensoAdapt technology. It promises up to 97% hair reduction in four to twelve weeks, with a high-speed flash rate for full body treatment, and is designed to last for years.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston launches new venture amid rumoured romance with Jim Curtis
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Jennifer Aniston's hair care brand, LolaVie, has launched its 12th product, the LolaVie Powder Perfect Dry Shampoo. The dry shampoo, developed through extensive trials, aims to lift roots and provide texture, offering a multipurpose solution for hair care. The product was recently used on a photoshoot giving real texture to the hair.

articles.title: 28 "Uncool" Products Under $25 That May Alter Your Life
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Megababe launched an odor-blocking foot spray containing tea tree oil to fight odor-causing bacteria. Monday Haircare released a dry shampoo. PanOxyl released an acne creamy wash that is gentler on the skin. Burt's Bees introduced After Sun Soother, a lightweight lotion with aloe and coconut oil. Liquid I.V. launched electrolyte drink mixes.

articles.title: You May Not Need WhatsApp To Use WhatsApp: Here's How
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: WhatsApp is developing a new feature called 'Guest Chats' that allows users to chat with non-WhatsApp users by sending them a link. The non-users can then join a one-on-one conversation via a web browser, with end-to-end encryption ensuring privacy. Initially, guest chats will be text-only and will not support media sharing, voice/video messages, or group chats.

articles.title: Proton launches ‘Dream a Dream' campaign to empower Nepali entrepreneurs
articles.author: KATHMANDU
articles.summary: Proton has launched 'Dream a Dream,' a new initiative designed to empower Nepali entrepreneurs. This campaign offers up to Rs 500,000 in funding to three winners and provides mentorship opportunities for the next season of Shark Tank Nepal.

articles.title: Nothing CMF Buds 2 Plus: A Premium Headset Under £1000
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nothing has launched CMF Buds 2 Plus, a new premium headset experience under £1000 featuring Active Noise Cancellation up to 45dB, Hi-Res Audio with LDAC codec support, customizable EQ, and dual device connection. It delivers balanced sound, effective noise cancellation, and clear call quality, supported by the Nothing X app for customization and firmware updates, with battery life up to 10 hours with ANC off and a fast charging feature providing up to 5 hours of playback with just 10 minutes of charging.

articles.title: Microsoft's Windows XP Crocs are no joke
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft has created limited edition Windows XP-themed Crocs to celebrate its 50th anniversary. These Crocs, available for preorder to Microsoft employees before a worldwide launch, feature the iconic Windows XP wallpaper design and come with a six-pack of Microsoft Jibbitz charms, including the MSN logo and Clippy. The Crocs are priced at $80 and include a Bliss drawstring backpack.

articles.title: PAX Unveils FLOW, the Brand's Most Powerful Dry Herb Cannabis Vaporizer Ever
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: PAX has launched PAX FLOW, a new flagship flower vaporizer, globally available starting August 5, 2025. The device, priced at $350, features hybrid heating technology, enhanced airflow, USB-C charging, and a sleek design, offered in Onyx and Greenstone.

articles.title: PAX Unveils FLOW, the Brand's Most Powerful Dry Herb Cannabis Vaporizer Ever
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: PAX announced the launch of PAX FLOW, a new portable dry herb vaporizer designed for modern cannabis consumers. FLOW delivers combustion-free vapor performance, superior flavor, and features an intuitive design.

articles.title: SundaySky Launches Amplify: The Most Powerful Way to Video-Enable Revenue Teams at Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SundaySky has launched SundaySky Amplify, a new AI-powered video solution intended to empower entire revenue teams to create and share personalized video content. The new product aims to allow more enterprise users to deliver professional-quality video content quickly and without requiring creative expertise.

articles.title: Panda Express® Ignites Menu with New Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken Made with Buldak's ...
articles.author: Panda Express
articles.summary: Panda Express has launched a new entree called Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken, inspired by Cantonese sweet and sour sauce and infused with Buldak's spicy flavor. This limited-time dish will be available at select Panda Express locations until October 7, 2025. This collaboration is Buldak's first U.S. partnership with a restaurant brand.

articles.title: Panda Express® Ignites Menu with New Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken Made with Buldak's Signature Heat
articles.author: Panda Express
articles.summary: Panda Express has launched a new entrée, Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken, in collaboration with Buldak, the spicy brand from Samyang. The dish, which combines sweet and sour flavors with Buldak's signature heat, will be available for a limited time in select U.S. locations. This marks Buldak's first U.S. restaurant partnership.

articles.title: 34 Products That Solve Annoying Problems So Fast
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features a variety of newly introduced consumer products. These include Lumify Eye Drops for redness reduction, SweatBlock wipes for sweat control, Elizavecca hair treatment for hair repair, Keurig cleaner pods for coffee machine maintenance, and the Revlon oil-absorbing volcanic face roller. Other products featured are the Miracle-Gro "food spikes" for revitalizing plants and a sleek one-button electric wine bottle opener.

articles.title: San Diegans among first in U.S. to try ultra-spicy new Panda Express dish
articles.author: Pamela Kragen
articles.summary: Panda Express is launching a new dish, Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken, enhanced with Buldak sauce, in select San Diego locations as part of a test market. This marks Samyang Foods' first U.S. restaurant partnership. The dish is designed to appeal to the growing demand for spicy food, particularly among Gen Z consumers.

articles.title: Penneys launches new app for Irish shoppers to tap into trends
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Penneys has launched a new customer app, providing an immersive browsing experience with features such as a stock checker, store locator, and personalized notifications. This app allows shoppers to easily access Penneys' latest trends, check product availability, and save favorite items for future visits.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE is the clamshell we really didn't need
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE, a new foldable phone with familiar features at a palatable price. It features Samsung's silicon, a new version of Android, a pair of outer cameras, and a distinctive cover screen. The Z Flip 7 FE arrives running Android 16 with Samsung's One UI 8 skin on top.

articles.title: Why omega-rich oils are key to healthier, shinier hair
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new haircare line called "Omega", featuring a hydrating hair oil and a leave-in conditioning spray. These products use a blend of seven plant-based omega-rich oils, including sunflower oil grown on Dyson Farms, and are designed to hydrate, smooth, and improve hair health for all hair types.

articles.title: StreetMetrics Launches Intelligence: The Command Center for Smarter OOH Decisions
articles.summary: StreetMetrics has launched StreetMetrics Intelligence, a platform for OOH media owners, advertisers, and agencies. It offers campaign performance, market trends, and inventory insights within one workspace, using SmartSearch and a large OOH data foundation.

articles.title: Penneys launches new customer app in Ireland
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: Penneys has launched its new customer app in Ireland.

articles.title: Everything to know as Penneys app finally coming to Ireland
articles.summary: Penneys (Primark) has launched a new mobile app, available on both iOS and Android, allowing customers to browse products, check stock availability in local stores, find store locations, and receive personalized notifications about new arrivals and collection launches. The app aims to enhance the shopping experience by providing a convenient way to explore Penneys' offerings.

articles.title: NSFW Alert! Elon Musk's Grok Can Now Generate Explicit Videos, Starts 'Spicy' Fest On X
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Elon Musk's AI company launched Grok Imagine, a new image and video generation feature available to SuperGrok and Premium+ X subscribers. The feature allows users to generate images and 15-second videos, including a 'spicy' mode that initially produced NSFW content, creating buzz on social media.

articles.title: 31 Dorm Products That Reviewers Call 'Essential'
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The article presents a selection of products aimed at college students setting up their dorm rooms. These include the BrüMate, a leakproof tumbler designed as an alternative to Stanley tumblers, Bedsure throw blanket, and the Swiffer WetJet for easy dorm floor cleaning. It also features the BedShelfie bedside shelf, which clips onto a bed frame and provides convenient storage.

articles.title: In first store partnership, Ikea opening mini-showrooms in Best Buys
articles.author: Tribune News Service
articles.summary: Store-in-stores will feature new kitchen and laundry products.

articles.title: In first store partnership, Ikea opening mini-showrooms in Best Buys
articles.author: Tribune News Service
articles.summary: Store-in-stores will introduce kitchen and laundry products. These products will be offered within the store-in-store concept.

articles.title: Another Chinese EV hits the market: JY Motors enters Israel with the Air model
articles.author: Ynet
articles.summary: Chinese automaker JY, previously known as Yudo, is introducing its first electric sedan to the market. This launch signifies JY's entry into the electric sedan segment.

articles.title: 30 Affordable Beauty Products So Good That Reviewers Say They Won't Use Anything Else
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies introduced new beauty and personal care products. Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream, while Mise En Scene introduced a hair hydration and heat protection serum. Olay launched a Super Serum Body Wash, and E.l.f released a Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara.

articles.title: Indian agritech startups are fueling Dubai's food future
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring an 8-inch AMOLED main display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, and a 200MP camera. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite and enhanced with Galaxy AI on Android 16/One UI 8, it boasts a thinner, lighter, and more powerful design with an IP48 rating.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's Favorite Machine Washable Shoes Are on Sale
articles.author: Mary Honkus
articles.summary: Rothy's 'The Point Slip-On Shoes,' known for being machine-washable and comfortable, are currently on sale at Amazon. These flats are made from recycled materials and provide support for all-day wear, making them a convenient option for busy individuals.

articles.title: Infinix 2025: Smarter, sexier & built for Nigerian lifestyles
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: Infinix Nigeria launched three new smartphones in 2025: the NOTE 50 Pro with AI features and Davido as the voice assistant, the HOT 60 Pro+ as the slimmest 3D curved AMOLED phone for content creators, and the SMART 10 Plus, an entry-level phone with Android 14 Go Edition. These smartphones are designed to be smart, stylish, and cater to different user needs.

articles.title: Get Apple's newest 2025 iPad for 30p a day with this cost-splitting pl
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: The Apple iPad 2025 is available for £10.50 monthly from Sky on a 48-month contract and includes color options like blue, pink, yellow, and silver. The device runs on iPadOS, is powered by the A16 chip, and features an 11-inch Liquid Retina display with increased starting storage of 128GB. Other options include the Lenovo Tab Tablet Bundle and the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9 8.7" Tablet.

articles.title: 43 Kitchen Upgrades That Won't Break The Bank
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of kitchen and home improvement products designed to enhance organization, cleanliness, and aesthetics. These include under-cabinet lights, organizers, cleaning solutions, and touch-up paints aimed at modernizing and maintaining kitchen spaces and appliances. Additionally, it features items that address organization and maintenance needs.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston's LolaVie Launches Another 'Swiss Army Knife' of Hair Products: All About Her Dry Shampoo (Exclusive)
articles.author: Jackie Fields
articles.summary: Jennifer Aniston's haircare brand LolaVie is launching its Powder Perfect Dry Shampoo, a nonaerosol, talc-free formula designed to clean hair and add volume. The dry shampoo, which Aniston describes as "fresh hair in seconds," is available at ulta.com and lolavie.com.

articles.title: The Dyson Supersonic Nural may blow you away but there's 34% off the older model – now from just AU$380
articles.author: Sharmishta Sarkar
articles.summary: Dyson has reduced the price of its Supersonic Origin hair dryer by 31% to AU$380. The Prussian Blue Dyson Supersonic is also discounted by 34% to AU$395 and includes three magnetic attachments, making it a recommended purchase.

articles.title: DJI Mini 5 Pro leaks reveal potential specs and design, but one big question remains
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Leaked information suggests that DJI is developing the Mini 5 Pro drone. The new drone is expected to have features like a 1-inch sensor and LiDAR-powered autofocus, making it the first Mini series drone to incorporate this technology. The design appears similar to the Mini 4 Pro, but with a larger camera module and forward-facing LiDAR sensors for obstacle avoidance.

articles.title: KFC Australia launches Zinger Kebab nationwide for limited time
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: KFC Australia launched the Zinger Kebab nationwide on August 5th as a limited-time offering until September 8th. The Zinger Kebab combines the Zinger fillet with tabouli, creamy garlic sauce, lettuce, and KFC's Supercharged Sauce, all wrapped in a flatbread. It is available for purchase individually, as part of a combo, or in a box meal, and can be ordered via the KFC App.

articles.title: Sandisk Showcases UltraQLCTM Technology Platform with Milestone Enterprise SSD Capacity at FMS 2025
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: SanDisk demonstrated a high-capacity 256TB NVMe enterprise SSD. This SSD represents a breakthrough in storage capacity, performance, and power efficiency.

articles.title: Man shares 'gran's cream' that 'cleared spots and blemishes in four days'
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: 47 Skin was founded after the founder experienced a skin transformation using a cream from his grandmother. The company offers a range of skincare products, including the Anti-Blemish and Scar Repair Serum, Everyday Cleanser, and Silver Mask, designed to address blemishes and skin concerns. The products are available on the company's official website.

articles.title: [Photo] No problem with single-person households...Sink-in-sink, Bespoke food century
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics released the 'Bespoke Dishwasher Countertop,' a new energy-efficient dishwasher designed to be placed on a countertop. The dishwasher can wash dishes for up to six people at a time.

articles.title: Character AI NSFW: Unfiltered Fun Or Just Unhinged?
articles.author: Soko Directory Team
articles.summary: The article introduces various AI chatbot services such as "Character AI NSFW," "free NSFW AI chat," "dirty talk AI," "Character AI 18," and "Crush on AI." These platforms offer users opportunities for engaging in various interactions, from flirty conversations to role-playing scenarios with diverse AI characters. These services provide entertainment, comfort, and a break from reality for users seeking unique digital experiences.

articles.title: FinQuest Philippines launches platform to connect SMEs and banks
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: FinQuest Philippines launched a new platform.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Chess with Graham! and 11 more events
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to enhance their network, aiming to connect both big cities and small towns. According to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile is now considered America's best mobile network in the US, demonstrating a significant service upgrade.

articles.title: Sandisk Showcases UltraQLCTM Technology Platform with Milestone Enterprise SSD Capacity at FMS 2025
articles.summary: Sandisk has launched its new enterprise-grade UltraQLC platform and SANDISK® 256TB1 NVMeTM SSD, built on that platform, designed for AI-driven, data-intensive workloads with high-performance speeds and power efficiency. The SANDISK® SN670 128TB1 NVMeTM SSD and SANDISK® UltraQLCTM 256TB1 NVMeTM SSD will be available in U.2 form factor in the first half of 2026.

articles.title: Samsung Display launches MONT FLEX foldable display brand
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samsung Display launched 'MONT FLEX,' a new foldable OLED display brand, to strengthen its position in next-generation display technology. The official debut of MONT FLEX is scheduled for the 2025 K-Display Exhibition in Seoul.

articles.title: Samsung Display unveils MONT Flexbrand for foldable screens
articles.summary: Samsung Display unveiled its new brand MONT Flex for its foldable OLED panels, emphasizing durability and slimness. The brand launch will occur at the Korea Display Exhibition.

articles.title: Ooredoo Drives Smart City Vision with Advanced Indoor 5G Test
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Ooredoo has tested a next-generation indoor 5G solution at Muscat Grand Mall. This marks the introduction or testing of an upgraded service by Ooredoo.

articles.title: Resist the App-ification of Everything
articles.author: Jill Filipovic
articles.summary: The Hatch sound machine requires users to download the Hatch app and connect it to Bluetooth and Wifi to function. The app requests personal information and is a prerequisite for the sound machine to play any sounds, even after the initial setup.

articles.title: Pamela Anderson Responds To Meghan Markle 'Rip-Off' Claims
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Pamela Anderson's show "Pamela's Cooking with Love" was released in February 2025 on Amazon Prime. Meghan Markle's cooking show "With Love, Meghan" premiered on Netflix in March, following a delay. Meghan's show has been compared to Pamela Anderson's show and other lifestyle brands.

articles.title: '‘이 성형수술' 받고, 눈 사시 됐다' 화제… 요즘 많이 받는 수술인데, 어쩌다?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: New refrigerators for 2024 are being advertised. Customers are directed to view prices for these refrigerators.

articles.title: Samsung Display launches MONT FLEX foldable display brand
articles.author: Nam Hyun-Woo
articles.summary: Samsung Display launched MONT FLEX, its new foldable OLED display brand, which will debut at the 2025 K-Display Exhibition. This brand represents the company's ambition to lead in foldable display innovation, highlighting mechanical durability, vivid display, minimal bezels, and thin design in its foldable OLED technology.

articles.title: On the 5th, Samsung Display announced that it will officially launch its foldable brand "MONT FLEXTM..
articles.author: Kim Dong Eun
articles.summary: Samsung Display is launching its new foldable display brand, 'MONT FLEXTM', which aims to publicize its foldable display technology. The brand name contains the technical orientations focusing on excellent folding durability, opto-mechanically flat screen, slim bezel enabling, and thin and light design. The new foldable OLED is praised for its thin and light weight and durability passing 500,000 folding tests.

articles.title: Google Introduces Mobile-Only Discovery Feature On Google Search
articles.author: The Herald
articles.summary: Google introduced a new mobile-only feature called People Cards on Google Search, allowing people to create their presence on the search platform.

articles.title: SEO Services in Ghaziabad ~ Full-Stack SEO Experts
articles.summary: The Digital Curve offers full-stack SEO services in Ghaziabad, aimed at helping businesses improve online visibility and Google rankings. Their services cover keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, local SEO, and link building, targeting startups, local businesses, and eCommerce brands.

articles.title: Google brings iPhone-style swipe animations to Android browsers: Here's how to turn them on
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new navigation feature to Chrome on Android, resembling iPhone-style swipe animations. This update includes a page transition effect, allowing users to preview the previous or next screen when swiping back or forward. The feature is currently being tested and can be enabled via Chrome flags.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Minnesota farmers invited to join Young Leader Program in Johnston
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Corteva's Global Business Center in Johnston will host part of the Young Leader Program. This program aims to develop leadership skills among soybean growers and is encouraging farmers in Minnesota to apply.

articles.title: Pokemon Generation 10 Starter Leaked
articles.author: Game Daily
articles.summary: Game Freak is speculated to be launching the 10th generation of Pokemon games, potentially in 2026. Leaks suggest the new game, set on a Greek Island, will feature starter Pokemon with base forms having secondary types, a departure from previous generations. The Pokemon Company and Game Freak have not officially announced any plans.

articles.title: Google launches People Cards to help Africans who want to be found on Google Search
articles.author: Naij
articles.summary: Google launched 'People Cards,' a new mobile-only feature that enhances discoverability on Google Search by enabling users to create an online presence.

articles.title: Krispy Kreme Crocs are officially on the menu! Shop the glazed doughnut-inspired collab
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Krispy Kreme is launching a special dozen donuts.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers ‘would never go back' to Dyson after finding cheap but ‘powerful' vacuum cleaner – was £229.99, now £109
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 52% discount on the Uninell Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, reducing the price to £109. The cordless vacuum features multiple modes including 'barefloor,' carpet, and turbo, along with a battery lasting up to an hour. It can also transform into a handheld vacuum.

articles.title: 45 Mundane Products Adults Might Be A Little Bit *Ahem* Horny For
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Built launched "Puff Protein Bars," chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Medicube introduced "Zero Pore" Pads, Korean skincare pads containing lactic and salicylic acid. Tineco created a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop with separate clean and dirty water tanks. Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream with glycerin, aloe, and salicylic acid.

articles.title: Singapore-made bot amble matchmakes strangers virtually
articles.author: Rhea Yasmine
articles.summary: Amble, initially launched as a Telegram bot in April 2023, has now released a dedicated app to offer users more features like concurrent matches and custom interfaces.  The Amble app aims to facilitate more thoughtful conversations, uses AI for user verification, and cross-checks phone numbers to prevent abuse, ensuring genuine connections.  The company will keep the Telegram bot as an option, but their primary focus will be the app.

articles.title: Samsung Just Launched 3 New Galaxy Smartphones-and You Can Save *Big* on Them (If You Act Fast)
articles.author: Destinee Scott
articles.summary: Samsung has launched three new smartphones: the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a larger screen and enhanced capabilities; the Galaxy Z Flip7, a thinner and more advanced flip phone with an intuitive camera and news updates via the Now Bar; and the Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, a more affordable model with similar features and impressive durability. These devices are available with trade-in offers, starting as low as $350.

articles.title: Reviewers Have Spoken: No Need To Search Further, These 37 Products Reign Supreme
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: TruSkin introduces a vitamin C serum formulated with hyaluronic acid, aloe vera, and vitamin E. CeraVe launches Skin Renewing night cream with ceramides, peptides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid. Bissell releases the Little Green carpet and upholstery cleaner alongside the CleanView bagless vacuum, designed for pet hair.

articles.title: 99x reports breakthrough market traction for new Agentic AI platform
articles.summary: 99x has launched Xians.ai, a proprietary orchestrator platform for Agentic AI, which is being adopted by clients across financial services, legal, insurance, transportation, and accounting industries. 99x also launched 'Percy the Prospector,' an AI-powered sales agent built on xians.ai, leading to increased sales pipeline activity.

articles.title: Xsolla and KRAFTON Launch "Abyss of Dungeons" Web Shop
articles.author: Xsolla
articles.summary: Xsolla and KRAFTON have collaborated to launch a dedicated Web Shop for KRAFTON's new game, Abyss of Dungeons, on June 11, 2025. The Web Shop provides players with direct access to exclusive in-game content and supports KRAFTON's community-first strategy by offering unique bundles and integrating with existing systems. It was launched using Xsolla's Web Shop template, and benefits KRAFTON through a scalable direct-to-player foundation.

articles.title: How Each Member of OKC Thunder Can IMPROVE
articles.summary: To stream WeAreIowa content on a phone, users need to download and use the WeAreIowa app.

articles.title: Amcor Reveals Shortlist for Lift-Off Contest
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Amcor announced the shortlist for its Amcor Lift-Off challenge, seeking solutions for Water Vapour Transmission Rate (WVTR) barriers in compostable packaging. Four start-ups will undergo further evaluation for potential collaboration, investment, and development agreements, with Amcor offering up to $500,000 in funding through its Lift-Off Sprints program to support breakthrough packaging technologies.

articles.title: AsiaInfo Technologies Expects to Achieve Accelerated Growth from the Three Core Growth Engines in 2025H2, ...
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: In the first half of 2025, the AI large model application and delivery business experienced substantial growth, with revenue increasing 76 times and order amounts rising 78 times year-over-year, signaling strong market demand for this service.

articles.title: Trend Micro combines AI and digital twin technology
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: Trend Micro launched a new security offering. This offering combines agentic AI and digital twin technology. The system creates a simulation for data-driven decision-making.

articles.title: KFC Australia launches Zinger Kebab nationwide for limited time
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: KFC Australia launched the Zinger Kebab nationwide. This new menu item became available on Tuesday, August 5.

articles.title: Samsung Display unveils foldable screen brand MONT Flex
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Display Co. unveiled its new brand on Tuesday, August 5th, in Seoul.

articles.title: Everyday Cheapskate: Frugal Laundry Tips That Will Save You a Fortune
articles.author: Mary Hunt
articles.summary: The article discusses laundry scent boosters available from companies like Downy (Downy Unstoppables) and Arm & Hammer (Arm and Hammer Scent Boosters Clean Sensations). It also provides a recipe to make a homemade laundry scent booster as a cost-effective alternative, suggesting a potential DIY approach to the product category.

articles.title: The ES Shopping Shortlist: What to shop, see and know in August 2025
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: This month features a series of recent product launches and fresh shopping updates.

articles.title: Sam Altman launches GPT-oss, OpenAI's first open-weight AI language model in over 5 years
articles.author: system
articles.summary: OpenAI launched two new open-source AI language models, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b. These models represent the company's return to releasing AI language models with open weights, as announced by CEO Sam Altman.

articles.title: 'I'M DANNY DYER, AND I'M A TOSSER.' DANNY DYER LEADS A SUMMER SIDE DISH REVOLUTION CALLING FOR THE NATION TO GET TOSSING (Deliveroo plc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Deliveroo is launching a new 'Freshness Promise' service this summer, offering a money-back guarantee on groceries. Danny Dyer is partnering with Deliveroo to promote the new service.

articles.title: Rackspace Technology Launches Cloud Management Platform with New Capabilities for Hybrid Environments
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Rackspace Technology launched a cloud management platform. This platform includes new capabilities. The platform is designed for hybrid environments.

articles.title: OpenAI and NVIDIA Propel AI Innovation With New Open Models Optimized for the World's Largest AI Inference Infrastructure (Nvidia Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: OpenAI has released two new open-weight AI reasoning models, including gpt-oss-120b, designed for developers and various organizations. NVIDIA collaborated with OpenAI on these models.

articles.title: What actually went wrong at Jaguar
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Jaguar unveiled a refreshed model nearly a year ago.
